timeline.bodyText:
This should be moved to a new Config section "nation" akin to the default Town settings section "town". The new section should be below the existing "town" section. Let me know if that doesn't make sense.
The 1st line highlighted above would then be NATION_DEF_BOARD("nation.default_board",
timeline.author: LlmDl
